title: Why isn't there a Pixel 5/Android user/operations manual?
content:
I came out of Windows Phone environment and am new to Android. This is taking way too long to learn.  I keep accidentaly turning stuff off or on. The on-phone tips are barely useful as they are too general.  It's really frustrating.  An in depth manual would be a God send.  Reading these tiny screens gives me a headache after a while.

Why isn't there a manual?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device
